entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of snow or rain or drizzle near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
